oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Full plate tintype of Cyrenneus R. Simpson Bobo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full plate tintype of Cyrenneus R. Simpson Bobo, wife of Samuel Bobo of Moore County (Tenn." Cyrenneus, oft referred to as Simmie, was born on December 31, 1818, in Bedford County (Tenn." She married Samuel Bobo in 1833 and they lived near Lynchburg, Lincoln County (Tenn." now Moore County (Tenn." She died on January 29,1892, and is buried in Bobo Cemetery in Lynchburg, Moore County (Tenn."
